values: 工作场所；作业现场；工作地点

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 工作；影响；受雇用（work的ing形式）

word_group.brief_definition: 工作场所暴力；职场暴力；工作地方暴力
工作场所的噪音；作业场所噪声
工作场所安全监管机构
工作单位安全管理者；工作单位安全监管者；工作单位安全调整者
工作场所侵犯；工作场所袭击
严重的工作场所攻击；严重的工作场所侵犯

bilingual.source: Proper ppo can prevent many workplace injuries.
bilingual.target: 合适的个人保护装备可以防止许多工作场所的伤害。

bilingual.source: She conforms to the dress code at her workplace.
bilingual.target: 她遵守工作场所的着装规定。

bilingual.source: Our company values inclusivity in the workplace.
bilingual.target: 我们公司重视工作场所的包容性。

bilingual.source: They felt discriminated against in the workplace.
bilingual.target: 他们在工作场所感到被区别对待。

bilingual.source: Avoid using derogatory language in the workplace.
bilingual.target: 避免在工作场所使用贬低的语言。

bilingual.source: We should avoid using dirty word in the workplace.
bilingual.target: 我们应该避免在工作场所使用脏话。

bilingual.source: Proper training can help reduce workplace hazards.
bilingual.target: 适当的培训可以帮助减少工作场所的危险。

bilingual.source: She decorated her workplace with plants and photos.
bilingual.target: 她用植物和照片装饰了她的工作场所。

bilingual.source: He faced discriminatory treatment at the workplace.
bilingual.target: 他在工作场所遭遇了歧视的待遇。

bilingual.source: Effective communication is crucial in the workplace.
bilingual.target: 在工作场所中，有效的沟通至关重要。

yingyinNormal.en: In the workplace, we women have been told to suppress it, contain it, ignore it. Well, you know what I say? Grab it! Grab it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在工作场所，我们女性被要求谦让、容忍、无视。你知道我怎么说吗？抓住机会！抓住机会！

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. I'll take "Idiots in the Workplace" for 200, Alex.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要我就在“工厂里的白痴”上押200，艾力克斯。

yingyinNormal.en: I think it's best to handle this as a common workplace issue.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我认为这是处理普通办公案件最好的办法。

yingyinNormal.en: And then I'll have to sue you for undue distress in the workplace.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后我就得起诉你让我在工作中过度劳累。

yingyinNormal.en: We don't have second-class citizens in this country, we shouldn't in the workplace, either.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在这个国家，我们没有二等公民，我们也不应该在工作中存在这样的情况。

yingyinNormal.en: The internet is this amazing distribution vehicle to get people's ideas into people's homes and workplace.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而网络则是让人们的灵感在千家万户乃至工作场地得以实现的渠道。

yingyinNormal.en: Apparently, my assistant Alex has filed a complaint accusing me of inappropriate behavior in the workplace.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的助理艾利克斯居然投诉了我，说我在办公场所有不当行为。

yingyinNormal.en: And, and finally when I thought you were making sexual advances in the workplace, I said no and I was not litigious.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最后当我以为你想趁工作之便占我便宜我拒绝了，但是没打算告你。

yingyinNormal.en: You did steal materials from the workplace? No, I lied by saying I never lied to the company. Could you be more specific?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你偷了公司的东西？不，我的确对公司撒过谎。能具体讲讲吗？

yingyinNormal.en: What is happening? I need your advice about a delicate workplace situation. To protect those involved, I'll be changing their names.
yingyinNormal.zh: 发生什么事了？我需要你们为一件敏感的职场关系给意见，为了保护当事人隐私，我会替他们取假名。

yingyinNormal.en: Anyway, despite the fact that he has a girlfriend, Shilly-Shally has been the recipient of inappropriate workplace flirtations from a young lady.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虽然他已经有一个女朋友，谢利沙力是遭年轻女性对他做不适宜的职场调戏的受方。

yingyinNormal.en: We've got to fight for the right to affordable health insurance for everybody, the right to fair pay, family leave, and workplace flexibility, the right to a fair living wage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们要为每个人争取获得平价医疗保险的权利，同工同酬的权利，休探亲假的权利以及自由选择工作地点的权利，获得一般生活水平的工资的权利。

yingyinNormal.en: The things we often take for granted like Social Security and Medicare, workplace safety laws and the right to organize for better pay and benefits, even weekends, we didn't always have these things.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们经常认为是理所当然的事情：包括社保和医保，安全生产法，组织起来争取更好的工资待遇的权利，周末休假的权利等等，这些都并不都是我们所能享有的。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 公司工作场所；公司办公室

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

n. 同事；合作者；共同工作的人
n. 工人；工作者；劳动者；工作的动物；做成特定事情的人；工人阶级；体力劳动者；辛勤工作的人；从事某种工作的人
n. 家务;家务劳动；家事

word_family.mean: n. 工作；劳动；职业；制作品；产品；工厂；活动机件；运转机构；防御工事；功；做功；需要的所有事物；全套事物

examination_example.sentence: If you have a bone to pick with someone in your <highlight>workplace</highlight>, you may try to stay tight-lipped around them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你对你工作场所的某个人有意见，你可以试着对他们守口如瓶。

examination_example.sentence: The difference between today's <highlight>workplace</highlight> and the "dress for success" era is that the range of options is so much broader.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当今职场与“穿出成功”时代的区别是选择的范围更广了。

examination_example.sentence: In a <highlight>workplace</highlight> that's fundamentally indifferent to your life and its meaning, office speak can help you figure out how you relate to your work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一个与你的生活及其意义根本无关的工作场所，办公室语言可以帮助你弄清楚你是如何与工作联系在一起的。

direction_info.description:

examination_example.sentence: Such <highlight>workplaces</highlight> are sometimes described as toxic.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种工作场所有时被描述为有毒的。

examination_example.sentence: Those deemed to be most destructive were odd people, those who allow personal problems into the <highlight>workplace</highlight> and those with an unpleasant temperament in general.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那些被认为最具破坏性的人是古怪的人，那些允许个人问题进入工作场所的人，以及那些总体上脾气不好的人。

examination_example.sentence: As lives are affected by any number of looming challenges—climate crisis, automation in the <highlight>workplace</highlight>—humans are going to need creative thinking more than ever.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着生活受到许多迫在眉睫的挑战的影响——气候危机、工作场所自动化——人类将比以往任何时候都更需要创造性思维。

examination_example.sentence: A Japanese IT firm has officially introduced an "office cat" policy to combat the stressful environment of the <highlight>workplace</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 日本一家信息技术公司正式推出“办公室猫”政策，以应对工作场所的紧张环境。

examination_example.sentence: In the <highlight>workplace</highlight>, too, trust is essential.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在工作场所，信任也是必不可少的。

examination_example.sentence: Self-esteem helps to combat gender inequality in the <highlight>workplace</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自尊有助于消除工作场所的性别不平等。

examination_example.sentence: If your <highlight>workplace</highlight> is full of distractions (使人分心的事), you'll need to make some changes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你的工作场所总是有使人分心的事，你就需要做出一些改变。

examination_example.sentence: You may need to remove your phone or TV from your <highlight>workplace</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可能需要把你的手机或电视从你的工作场所移走。

examination_example.sentence: When did parents in the US take their kids to the <highlight>workplace</highlight> this year?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国的父母今年什么时候带孩子去工作场所？
